actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the Government's adoption of a policy concerning foreign investment in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress with respect to the Government's adoption of a policy concerning foreign investment in the United States. States that the Government should give consideration to developing policies which would promote the objective of a strong domestic economy within the framework of an interdependent world.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the Government's adoption of a policy concerning foreign investment in the United States.
